thread.title: Lighthizer Should Take a Longer-Term View

author: wsjcom
title: Lighthizer Should Take a Longer-Term View
text: U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer’s all-or-nothing approach to overseas investment is very shortsighted (“Nafta Proposal Jolts Energy Sector,” U.S. News, April 25). A U.S. firm might choose to invest in another country for multiple reasons. In the energy sector, location of natural resources plays a key role in that decision. For other sectors, it could be the trade-off between the costs associated with exporting a product overseas compared to the benefit of being closer to your customer base through foreign direct investment. Furthermore, overseas investment typically is associated with complementary job increases...
